SELECT TBL_FAQclassify.FAQCLASSIFYID,TBL_FAQclassify.FAQCLASSIFYNAME,sum(TBL_FAQquestion.COLLECTION) as a FROM TBL_FAQclassify,TBL_FAQquestion WHERE TBL_FAQclassify.FAQCLASSIFYID=TBL_FAQquestion.FAQCLASSIFYID AND TBL_FAQclassify.FAQPARENTID=#{0} GROUP BY TBL_FAQquestion.FAQCLASSIFYID ORDER BY a DESC
